attributes.action: let staywarm grants be used for microgeneration
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: individuals should be able to use staywarm grants to purchase wind turbines and other micrgeneration technologies as insulation and central heating improvements will not reduce fuel poverty in light of increases in utility bills. Also, it should be possible to add this grant to the existing grants individuals can get for renewable energy in the home as vunerable people simply cannot afford renewable energy technologies with the current system.
